description: This file defines the DUEL templating engine, including type definitions, view binding, rendering to HTML and DOM, and utility functions. It includes internal classes and methods for processing templates, handling attributes, and rendering output.

classes.name: Markup
classes.description: Wraps a string value to maintain as raw markup in output.

classes.name: Result
classes.description: Represents a view result, capable of rendering to HTML or DOM, and handling errors.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Determines the type of a value, returning internal type constants.

methods.name: append
methods.description: Appends a child node or attribute to a parent node in the template structure.

methods.name: bindContent
methods.description: Binds a template node to data, producing a fragment or value.

methods.name: loop
methods.description: Handles iteration over arrays or objects for template binding.

methods.name: xor
methods.description: Processes conditional blocks, returning the first true block.

methods.name: call
methods.description: Invokes another view within the template.

methods.name: part
methods.description: Replaces a placeholder with a named partial view.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Main function that binds a template node to data, dispatching based on node type.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Converts a view structure into an HTML string.

methods.name: toDOM
methods.description: Converts a view structure into DOM nodes, optionally replacing an existing element.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Replaces the entire document with the current view.
